meanings.definition: Uncials: a style of writing in which the letters are rounded and separated, used especially in Greek and Latin manuscripts.
meanings.sent1: The ancient manuscript was written in beautiful uncial letters.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study uncial scripts to understand ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: The uncial letters danced across the page, telling stories of old.
meanings.sent4: Her uncial handwriting was like a gentle breeze, flowing effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The uncial style of writing added a touch of elegance to the document.

meanings.definition: Uncials: a type of script in which all the letters are in capital form.
meanings.sent1: The uncial text was easy to read due to its capital letters.
meanings.sent2: Inscriptions on monuments often use uncial lettering for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The uncial capitals stood proudly on the stone tablet.
meanings.sent4: His name was engraved in uncial letters, immortalizing his memory.
meanings.sent5: The uncial script on the banner caught the eye of every passerby.
